pages.title: From Ore to Fuel
pages.text: Raw uranium ore → crushed dust → centrifuge → enriched material → fuel rods. Each step concentrates uranium-235. Higher enrichment = more power per rod.

pages.title: Mining & Crushing
pages.text: Mine raw uranium ore. Crush it with a $(l:warium_integrations:processing/crusher)crusher$(/l) to uranium dust. A single ore yields 1 dust block (scaling depends on crusher tier).

pages.title: Centrifuge Processing
pages.text: Feed uranium dust into a $(l:warium_integrations:processing/centrifuge)centrifuge$(/l). It separates out enriched uranium (U-235) from depleted uranium (U-238). Enriched is what reactors want.

pages.title: Fuel Rod Crafting
pages.text: Combine enriched uranium pellets + reactor casing in a crafting grid $(bold)OR$() use a $(l:warium_integrations:processing/circuit_fabricator)circuit fabricator$(/l) for bulk production. Fabricator is much faster.

pages.title: Supply Chain Tip
pages.text: Set up $(bold)automatic mining → crushing → centrifuge → fabricator → reactor$() pipeline. One miner feeding a centrifuge can sustain a modest reactor indefinitely.
